group_1.narration: [textBlack:Chocolate, chocolate, where is the chocolate?@Rumbly in my tumbly. Where is the chocolate?]
[textBlack:Chocolate, chocolate, where is the chocolate?@What is it I want? I want chocolate.]

group_1.textRight: The Mirror Witch's Labyrinth...

group_1.textLeft: ...is being contaminated by another universe?

group_1.textCenter: That's right! I mean, technically speaking...
It's being contaminated by@Witches from a parallel world!
(After tracing back my old memories in this form...)
(I finally understood...)
(There are a lot of worlds that are a little@different from this universe...)
(In one of those other universes,@there was another Nagisa...)
(that wished for [textRed:chocolate cake]@instead of cheesecake,)
(and that's how she became a Magical Girl...)

group_1.narration: the true identity of that Witch@that loves chocolate instead of cheese...
must be the Nagisa from@another universe that wished for@chocolate cake and Witched out!

group_1.textRight: Hold up, I still don't really get what you're saying...
Explain just what's going on here.

group_1.textLeft: (Ah... This isn't good.)
(There are way too many things I can't talk about!)
(I'll have to fudge all the inconvenient@bits and explain the rest better...)
Well...um...you see...

group_1.textRight: So then, Nagisa, according to your theory...
The Mirror Witch's Labyrinth is connected@to parallel worlds? Is that right?

group_1.textLeft: That's exactly right.
That chocolate-loving Witch came from another@universe...a parallel universe to ours!
Mami, you said it too when you@saw what this place looks like.

group_1.textRight: It's kind of like...
...like it's been mixed with another world, isn't it?
...Contamination from other worlds...
But why is it just Nagisa that's affected?
She's the only one that's had@her outfit and tastes changed.

group_1.textLeft: O-oh, yeah... Um... I wonder why that is...?

group_1.textRight: This Witch is trying to take@over the Mirror Labyrinth...
Perhaps, as this Labyrinth is contaminated@by this parallel universe,
our appearances, and even our minds, will be@replaced with the ones from that world?
But that hasn't happened to the rest of us, right?

group_1.textLeft: (N-no way...)
(Is it only going after me?!)
(Is the ex-Nagisa trying to take over this Nagisa?)
(No, no... There isn't any point in doing that...)

group_1.textRight: ...Could there be any reason that Nagisa would@be more susceptible than the rest of us?

group_1.textLeft: (That could be it...)
(Because it's an ex-Nagisa that's the root@of the problem in the first place...)
...I don't understand it.

group_1.textRight: Speaking of not understanding things...
What was with that doggy Witch we just fought?
She dropped a Grief Seed,@so we know she was a real Witch.

group_1.textLeft: We fought a Witch guarding a rose garden, too.

group_1.textRight: So then, are these Witches from@an alternate universe too?

group_1.textLeft: ...Every Witch that was behind@one of those weird mirrors,
was setting a trap.

group_1.textRight: That little Witch was the only one hanging@around outside of a mirror...

group_1.textLeft: ...Could it be possible that...
Those mirrors are gates to parallel worlds?

group_1.textRight: What do you mean, Homura?

group_1.textLeft: Beyond the mirrors, it's like passageways@from other universes.
Those Witches are trying to@cross over from parallel worlds.
But there are other powerful Witches around,
so I think they're too scared to come out.

group_1.textCenter: I see, I see!
It's not that there are other@Labyrinths INSIDE the mirror...
It's that the other side of the@mirror leads to other universes.
And that's where the Witches are laying their traps!

group_1.textLeft: On this side, there's the sweets-loving Witch...
It's found a way to harness the magic@of the Mirror Witch's Labyrinth,
and is gradually taking over this territory.
Could that be preventing the other@Witches from emerging...?

group_1.textRight: So those weird mirrors are...gates?@If that's how it is...
Then I guess Nagisa is right.
This really is a case of another universe@contaminating this one, huh?
So that would mean...
Those Witches are being drawn@here from another world.

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps they're lured in by@all the magic that's gathered here.

group_1.textCenter: (That sounds like it could be right!)
(Only, the thing is...there shouldn't be Witches@in any other universes anymore.)
(If they did exist, it would only@be as a Witch's "egg"...)
(It'd have to be in that moment,)
(when a Witch is about to be born from a@Soul Gem and "God" calls for it...)
(But...what if, while the egg@was being carried back...)
(...its path was connected to this Labyrinth.)
(What happens if the egg that's being carried into@the heavens gets spilled out on the way?)
(Those newborn Witch eggs would@go searching for magic power.)
(What if they gathered here@because of the Labyrinth...?)
(And the exits are those weird@mirrors...those gates?)
(But somehow, one of them@learned to absorb magic.)
(A Witch who began to walk proudly through@the Mirror Witch's Labyrinth...)
(The gluttonous one, who was just hoarding magic...)
(And that's how Mirrorland became Candyland?)
(So then, that chocoholic...is an ex-Nagisa...)
(Who spilled out while on@her way to the Law of Cycles...?)
(And couldn't even be reincarnated@as a wonderful round donut...)

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Wibble Wobble, eggs in the air♪@Wibble Wobble, falling from there♪]
[textBlack:All of God's angels, in all of their haste♪@Couldn't remake the eggs from the paste♪]
